title: ESAF SFB gets RBI nod for re-appointment of K Paul Thomas as MD & CEO
description: The bank will seek approval of the shareholders for the said re-appointment within the prescribed period, it said. Additionally, Paul Thomas is the Chairman of the Board of Sa-Dhan, the association of microfinance and impact finance institutions, it added.
